data.text:
#FlashbackFriday to 1908 when this girl was working in a cotton spinning mill in South Carolina, USA. 

Learn about @ILO's work to end child labour and its quest for social justice in this #ILO100 slideshow. https://t.co/tzh0taexoW https://t.co/dCTQL6iA90
Island journalists have a critical role to play in reporting on the #GlobalGoals. @UNOHRLLS released a new #SAMOAPathway guide to help them ➡️ https://t.co/RhDdnIhmTA https://t.co/9tCSEX0Uvm

Find out how you can work together with the @IntlCrimCourt to build a more peaceful, just world by deterring crimes and promoting accountability and access to justice. https://t.co/zgdPmPU6dA https://t.co/M188E9jLwA
Libya: @UNOCHA condemns attack on ambulance that seriously injured health workers, including Tripoli's director of emergency services. Ambulances are #NotATarget! https://t.co/8gpKFgSzQt

Meet @antonioguterres' newest advocates for people, planet and prosperity. They'll be working around the world to raise awareness, inspire greater ambition & push for more action on the #GlobalGoals https://t.co/DUz2GgcwrR https://t.co/saM6KLge8k

Democratic Republic of Congo: @antonioguterres concerned by number of new Ebola cases, but applauds bravery of those working to stem outbreak. 100,000+ vaccinated thus far through @who campaign. https://t.co/sldWMbXsed https://t.co/kc2Ej7bwv2

Kids are speaking up. 
Kids are demanding their rights. 
Kids are acting now for a better tomorrow. 

What will you do to ensure every right, #ForEveryChild? https://t.co/VlDhRQBeKO via @UNICEF https://t.co/ep2Xms7eX5

Meet Julietta, @WFP‘s first female aviation security officer & aeronautical engineer, who is helping to get life-saving food to some of the world's hardest to reach places. https://t.co/hLL5dC2n0h #ZeroHunger https://t.co/rlAHzMKJFt
It’s Global Road Safety Week. #SpeakUp & demand safer roads & journeys for everyone. https://t.co/YEWtzc2BIz https://t.co/M91L4GJrlM
Establishing the rule of law is essential to securing peace & stability in Libya -- Chief @IntlCrimCourt Prosecutor tells Security Council on Wednesday. https://t.co/hFenuuZxFF

In Geneva, @antonioguterres and @AminaJMohammed were on hand to  celebrate 100th anniversary of @ILO and its efforts to achieve social justice and decent work for all. https://t.co/GxTaV7q6T8  #ILO100 https://t.co/ChZoDSVjyb

Hunger is on the rise in the Near East & North Africa, as conflict and lack of rural development are hampering efforts to achieve #ZeroHunger by 2030, according to new @FAO report ➡️ https://t.co/FGC8n96pFn https://t.co/XocCJq8Bvp

After the Second World War, the UN was established to save succeeding generations from the scourge of war. Find out more about this week's time of remembrance for those who lost their lives during #WWII, https://t.co/r1eVpvH24q https://t.co/LEzqbOCRzF

Happy birthday Sir David Attenborough and thank you for your tireless commitment to #ClimateAction! 

Here is how you can join him in protecting our planet: https://t.co/zTkumwytsA https://t.co/mYUeBWNw2r

Thousands of women, men & children are observing Ramadan while trapped in Rukban settlement in Syria, with limited access to basic necessities like food & water. @WFP is trying to help. https://t.co/g2RjYPqCST

 https://t.co/vqsGF7JzEC

Trees & forests provide:
🌳2.5 billion small-scale farmers with livelihoods
🌿2.4 billion people with fuel for cooking & heating
🌱1.6 billion people with timber, food, jobs & shelter
 
Learn more as UN Forum on Forests continues at UNHQ: https://t.co/TwwlGl8LpG https://t.co/AvSxJ7mvkp
Find out more about @UN_Careers, the different job categories in the UN and the kind of work staff members perform ➡️ https://t.co/J6VgGEHgv9 https://t.co/0xUlCf6dPW
Join us in remembering those who lost their lives during the Second World War. Info on this week's time of remembrance: https://t.co/r1eVpvH24q  #WWII https://t.co/14RXIvupYu
New @UN_OCT initiative to help countries detect, track and counter terrorists and their travel: https://t.co/jycmKDcsEQ https://t.co/3HdYhQUZdm

#GameOfThrones star & @UNDP Goodwill Ambassador @nikolajcw visited #ClimateAction projects in Rwanda. Find out how you can join him in protecting our 🌎 and ensuring that #WinterIsHere when it should be: https://t.co/hXpfJvTGMO

https://t.co/KaGQkEuiwI

"Our peacekeepers are deployed to increasingly complex & often hostile environments. Training prepares them for their vital peacekeeping tasks & improves their performance." -- @antonioguterres tells Security Council meeting on @unpeacekeeping. https://t.co/o0BTihUvW8 https://t.co/UJkx8cYrjP

As global demand for sand & gravel increases, new @unenvironment report sheds light on the damaging consequences of extraction, including pollution, flooding & worsening droughts. https://t.co/XlfP8nRvEp #GlobalGoals
Every day, around 3,700 people die in road crashes. For Global Road Safety Week, take action & #SpeakUp in support of safer roads for everyone. https://t.co/YEWtzbL0jZ https://t.co/hPdfjjYDM8

News: @_AfricanUnion & UN issue joint communiqué committing to continue to work closely together in addressing peace and security issues & to achieving the #globalgoals in Africa. Details here: https://t.co/4HkJhP5yQI https://t.co/t8H9O1Sk88
Midwives save millions of lives each year & are critical defenders of womens' rights. More on their important work: https://t.co/x0SldZ7jb7 #GlobalGoals
New exhibit at UNHQ in NYC highlights issues faced by women & girls of African descent. More on the International Decade of People of #AfricanDescent: https://t.co/2AfcfSYB41 https://t.co/8KDyGj3ps4

Civilians are #NotATarget. They need to be protected. 

This powerful @UNOCHA photo exhibit features civilians caught in conflicts in four different countries: https://t.co/CnsxG9B5Fs

The colleagues we remember today died in the service of humanity ... let us honour their memory by rededicating ourselves to promoting peace, prosperity & opportunity for every woman, man & child -- @antonioguterres at memorial for fallen UN staff https://t.co/NHgYF7gN5q https://t.co/JHtY68JllT

Around one million species are now threatened with extinction - more than ever before in human history.

New @IPBES report explores the transformative changes needed to restore & protect nature. https://t.co/HBGIKdyLIA #IPBES7 https://t.co/PXKgPqT8Zo

There is enough food on the planet for every single person, yet 1 in 9 people go to bed hungry every night. See how reducing food waste can help achieve #ZeroHunger: https://t.co/j4W7wT2BAA 

 https://t.co/VtgyxKdGie
Starts on Monday at UNHQ: UN Forum on Forests #UNFF14. Details ➡️ https://t.co/gLcrXnQtdo https://t.co/QjGSYics2B
What's happening this week at the UN? UN - @_AfricanUnion Annual Conference, Global Road Safety Week, World Migratory Bird Day & much more. https://t.co/28eSBlR3gS https://t.co/5ccKxEASFB
Despite violence & conflict, @UNICEF has vaccinated over 34 million children in the Middle East & North Africa since the beginning of the year. #VaccinesWork https://t.co/KtRxrFWu8T

“I'm on Instagram to give you a first-hand look at my job as Secretary-General and share what motivates me to strive for a better, more peaceful world for us all.”  

@antonioguterres is now on @Instagram! Follow here: https://t.co/BVVicN4gt8 https://t.co/7ddosJZec1

New #WeAreIndigenous exhibit at UNHQ portrays indigenous peoples in their traditional clothing & surroundings, highlighting the incredible diversity of the indigenous cultures of the world. https://t.co/u2k7UjuwlV https://t.co/l6OvXyHFPK

Peace and compassion are the focus of Muslims around the world during this month of Ramadan.

Ramadan Mubarak to all celebrating! https://t.co/C5EwfCC9XN
Students at a primary school in northern Senegal enjoy healthy meals cooked on a energy efficient stove thanks to @WFP's school meals programme. #ZeroHunger https://t.co/UOItKXo1ce

Women are more vulnerable to climate change than men due to unequal rights & access to resources. Yet they are also vital in taking #ClimateAction. @UNDP explains. https://t.co/vOrWm1UKEp https://t.co/5sOcogc7ZM
Many workplaces around the world don’t provide adequate paternity leave. Yet giving fathers time off benefits families, employers & whole societies: https://t.co/9D4GYNgbId #GlobalGoals
The #GlobalGoals promote peaceful & inclusive societies, access to justice for all and effective, accountable institutions. Find out more: https://t.co/JOa09rEbFP https://t.co/J5TasqlxAx

Community gardens in Afghanistan are about more than growing vegetables - they are helping ensure women can earn an income, build skills & create a brighter future. #ZeroHunger via @WFP https://t.co/5FIsSS5fJH

Landmark resolution on sexual violence in conflict was adopted by Security Council, emphasizing: 
➡️ Stronger legislation
➡️ More effective monitoring & documentation
➡️ Survivor-centered approaches 
More: https://t.co/d9akzaMCmg https://t.co/DkXDWzD23a
New @WHO study shows that European countries continue to face childhood obesity challenges, which impacts education, social care and the economy: https://t.co/vLYZveb9tF https://t.co/rqzE3iS7YG
Secretary-General @antonioguterres is now on @Instagram! Follow him for a behind-the-scenes look at his unique job here: https://t.co/BVVicMMFBA https://t.co/2t3arHnQuH

For some, work is a fulfilling endeavor - for others, a matter of survival. New issue of #Voyages from @UNDPEurasia explores how the workplace can become a space of humanity & support. https://t.co/xP4PdFn79P https://t.co/X5Jxk5RbBL
Latest @UNStamps feature 12 different marine animals from the endangered species list. Find out more about this unique stamp series: https://t.co/PIPVzRflHB #Wild4Life https://t.co/bjIFThbF6B
See how @FAO helped schools in Kyrgyzstan team up with local farmers to find reliable sources of quality produce for school meals. https://t.co/FgoAUAmR9u #ZeroHunger
Little Susanna was the first baby in Ghana to receive a malaria vaccine, thanks to a pilot programme launched by @WHO this week.  https://t.co/quYV1VAWT8 #VaccinesWork https://t.co/JKU3ivDxxZ

The @UN4Indigenous Forum wrapped up on Friday, after a colourful & inspiring two weeks at UNHQ focused on the protection of traditional knowledge. https://t.co/yeEVsEEG0I #WeAreIndigenous https://t.co/gP5BEG6627

On Friday, #UNGA honoured the victims of the Sri Lanka terror attacks. “The international community stands together in the fight against extremism and violence in all its forms,” said @UN_PGA María Fernanda Espinosa Garcés. https://t.co/xAd7AURrEn
The role of young people in building greater human solidarity takes centre stage, as Intercultural Dialogue Forum comes to a close in Baku, Azerbaijan.  https://t.co/h3APT4tuEQ

Crop failures due to dry spells, heatwaves & flooding leave more than 10 million people in Democratic People's Republic of Korea suffering from worst food shortages in a decade. https://t.co/HzsfNmi2CQ
UN Peacekeepers come from different countries, cultures and backgrounds -- but share a common purpose to protect the most vulnerable. https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z #ServingForPeace https://t.co/QKAmH5H9pn

A free and transparent press is a cornerstone of democracy. 

On #WorldPressFreedomDay, learn how the press helps build impartial institutions & promotes accountability. https://t.co/b6MFNEMs5y https://t.co/m8CutNMIxn

A new market opened its doors in rural Mozambique - allowing local people to access a range of fresh food & other basic necessities, thanks to support from @UNCDF and partners. https://t.co/CMkLTzImkP #ZeroHunger https://t.co/ZzsN7n4HAC
"A free press is essential for peace, justice, sustainable development and human rights" -- @antonioguterres on Friday's #WorldPressFreedomDay https://t.co/eR61wl5bgQ https://t.co/QBZVSyWiqh
Advocates & activists from 130+ countries are in Bonn, Germany for the #SDGglobalFest to share ideas & solutions that help achieve the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/dBp1DRlxe7 https://t.co/rENyHjzoVA

Without journalists, there is no journalism.
Without journalism, there is no democracy.

Defend journalism on Friday's #WorldPressFreedomDay & every day. https://t.co/b6MFNEMs5y https://t.co/zWf31dQSym

"Young people are our hope, not only for the future, but also for our present." -- @UNAOC's @MiguelMoratinos as World Forum on Intercultural Dialogue opens in Azerbaijan. https://t.co/mR7WT6DYJt https://t.co/RoEAVs8pLl

30 years ago, the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child was adopted. Join @UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador David Beckham in demanding that every child has every right.  https://t.co/VlDhRQBeKO #ForEveryChild. https://t.co/NTFDtAXQTe

“I have become motivated to play a positive role in this community, so that I can return the love that has been given to me." 

Watch a Syrian family's story of resettlement in Ireland. https://t.co/EmezWxBJcr #WithRefugees https://t.co/IC2DzLhObV
Check out our latest @instagram story which honours the brave men & women from El Salvador #ServingForPeace with @unpeacekeeping. https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU https://t.co/KjZ64R1obW

Tuna are threatened by an overwhelming demand.

On Thursday's #WorldTunaDay, see what effect your choice of seafood has on achieving a sustainable future https://t.co/XvOaw5Mfkr   #GlobalGoals https://t.co/DheREjwQC9

As experts meet this week on biodiversity & the ecosystem at #IPBES7 in Paris, you too can have your voice heard & take action to protect the planet. Here's how: https://t.co/ffnPM8aKjF #ClimateAction https://t.co/7mPu1CA2IU
Tuna provide food & employment, helping to achieve the #GlobalGoals. More on Thursday's #WorldTunaDay: https://t.co/9p892T1Dnm https://t.co/tGyghvL8XG

Countering discrimination, inequality & conflict through dialogue is the focus of this year's World Forum on Intercultural Dialogue - starting Thursday in Azerbaijan. https://t.co/yc5joepju7 https://t.co/FMvoGQCqLQ
Meet Sandra, one of the helicopter pilots from El Salvador #ServingForPeace with @UN_MINUSMA to protect civilians in Mali. https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z https://t.co/ERIuN7p8uZ

Tuna is popular. So popular that in many places it is overfished. 

When you eat tuna, make sure it's sustainably managed to help protect fish stocks - on Thursday's #WorldTunaDay & every day. https://t.co/XvOaw5Mfkr #GlobalGoals https://t.co/stHKCal2xO

"We call on all sides to show maximum restraint and on the authorities to respect the right to peaceful assembly." - @unhumanrights on situation in Venezuela. https://t.co/u2i4SFdJ1c https://t.co/QHAmbD74KO

“@UNFPA is the UN's torchlight for the millions of women in the last 50 years who have struggled to obtain their rights to decision-making over their lives & bodies.” -- @AminaJMohammed marking #UNFPA50 https://t.co/BkxK1po9bV https://t.co/pLaOfQlRX7
Wednesday: @indonesiaunny takes on rotating presidency of the Security Council for the month of May. https://t.co/x7BVCNC0Ol https://t.co/qiBtuAL3aC

UN Peacekeepers from El Salvador leave their families behind and work in harsh conditions to protect others. We thank them for their service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z #ServingForPeace https://t.co/fcs0Fw968H

News: @ashanti, @MeaganGood, @machelmontano, @UNEnvironment Goodwill Ambassador @adriangrenier & more to join @UN_PGA at #PlayItOut concert in Antigua to #BeatPlasticPollution: https://t.co/5PwPmZyzHv https://t.co/Jm0mNMBZuH
Millions of people around the world are celebrating Wednesday's #MayDay. For 100 years, @ILO has strived to achieve decent work for all: https://t.co/oJPqMi8Rcl #ILO100 https://t.co/oSqlmOnr27

If people stop vaccinating, outbreaks occur.

This World Immunization Week, know the facts: any licensed vaccine has been rigorously tested to make sure it is safe and effective for you & your family. #VaccinesWork 👉https://t.co/n8vUcXWjwt https://t.co/5WDCaWhVP0

146 refugees evacuated from Libya to Italy in a joint operation between @Refugees and Italian & Libyan authorities. 

Italy is the first country to have stepped forward to receive evacuees from Libya since the recent violence began.

https://t.co/lBYoOr0Qva

🎉 Happy 70th birthday, @antonioguterres! 🎉

Colleagues at UNHQ found time in the Secretary-General's busy schedule to throw him a surprise party. 

Help mark the occasion by joining the Secretary-General in taking #ClimateAction. Get ideas at https://t.co/TvKG7epdbN https://t.co/3HwKCxFC1j

Jazz breaks down barriers and fosters peace. 

Join people around the world in celebrating Tuesday's International #JazzDay! 

Details from @UNESCO: 🎷🎶 https://t.co/3E2if4zKny  🎷🎶 https://t.co/Yz4hg8Hxp7

"I know how it feels to be unjustly detained, and to not know how or when it will end. All detainees are vulnerable to human rights violations" – @UNHumanRights chief @mbachelet. #StandUp4HumanRights
https://t.co/jMEBzUUKF0

🎶Jazz creates opportunities for mutual understanding & tolerance. 🎶

Find out more from @UNESCO on Tuesday's #JazzDay: https://t.co/MnYS5aOtin https://t.co/y1PYXkcqFI

A highly-anticipated global assessment on biodiversity & ecosystems is just one of the many topics experts are discussing this week at #IPBES7 in Paris. Learn more: https://t.co/FF89jAu3qE https://t.co/OTJiY2AbpX
.@UNICEF seeks $29M to provide improved health, safety & education services for 300,000+ Venezuelan children in Colombia. https://t.co/igzHtMSyNk #EveryChild
Jazz makes the most of the world’s diversity - bringing people & cultures together. Tuesday is #JazzDay. Details from @UNESCO: https://t.co/MnYS5awRTN https://t.co/YgxTJ9bK8r
New, groundbreaking UN recommendations for global action on every driver of antimicrobial resistance released: https://t.co/jUob0ls1Hk #StopSuperbugs https://t.co/HF5ZQ4y0wp

.@UN_OCT wants your ideas about young people & terrorism - and how intolerance, discrimination & hate speech are putting the world's youth at risk. Have your voice heard here: https://t.co/O2EI1DevV5 #Youth2030 https://t.co/orzluTHVVZ
Starts Monday in NYC:  Committee on Information meeting, which oversees global communications work. Details: https://t.co/RoOTBCUTay https://t.co/cy6grh8QNN
Leaders & influencers attend #SDGGlobalFest 2019 in Bonn this week to drive action to achieve the #GlobalGoals. Details: https://t.co/sN6L3PLeFZ https://t.co/uJ5jnQ5KHB
Monday in New York: special @UNECOSOC meeting on int'l cooperation in tax matters, focusing on taxes and environmental protection, inequality & more: https://t.co/ItPxMcFZMF https://t.co/L6paDZyH2x
What's happening this week at the UN? #JazzDay, #WorldTunaDay, #WorldPressFreedomDay & much more: https://t.co/28eSBlzspk https://t.co/0o0mt0dtwn

Ensure #WinterIsHere when it should be.
Join @UNDP Goodwill Ambassador @nikolajcw of #GameOfThrones & take #ClimateAction today: https://t.co/zTkumwgS40 https://t.co/Zr9qMlwdDp

"Every choice we make matters." -- Actor and activist @AlecBaldwin is calling for urgent #ClimateAction. Find out how you can join him in protecting the 🌎: https://t.co/zTkumwytsA https://t.co/P9Did3CRdx

If mothers don’t have the food they need for their children, the consequences can last a lifetime. 

@WFP works to #FeedOurFuture by supporting the millions of vulnerable mothers who deserve proper nutrition. https://t.co/1Lbty0Vfzn https://t.co/pz7YqMmVxW

Protect a child. 👶🏻
Protect a community. 👫
Protect the world! 🌎

Any licensed vaccine has been rigorously tested to make sure it is safe and effective for you and your family. https://t.co/dfMvZh2EXs #VaccinesWork https://t.co/tiu4Y0tLZa

Every year more than 374 million people are injured or made ill through work-related accidents. For 100 years, @ILO has striven to improve working environments: https://t.co/8O3hLZ9KqY #SafeDay19 https://t.co/FyaiDoy0JJ
1 accident can destroy a lifetime of career opportunities. On Sunday's #SafeDay19, @ILO explains how to keep your workplace safe & healthy https://t.co/4hJinzls7Z #GlobalGoals https://t.co/rhLtz16Bl2

Solving  the world’s most pressing challenges, from climate change to the evolving nature of work, requires collective action and fresh thinking. 

Here’s how the UN is putting #InnovationInAction to improve lives everywhere: https://t.co/hssfrXSlIA https://t.co/CK0vZ9IkKK
Improving the safety and health of young workers is an investment in the future. More on Sunday's Health & Safety at Work Day: https://t.co/eCC7Dpwxit #SafeDay19 https://t.co/5lq6TKeJyb
We welcomed special guests this week: wild geese arrived at UNHQ in NYC. @VisitUN has details about how you too can take a trip to the UN: https://t.co/kRY5hpoXqM https://t.co/jW8HfuhRD0
